markings: LRC, stamped in black: [Silvestra Manaigo Venez.a]
medium: Pen, brown ink and wash over black chalk on paper with oil paint highlights
provenance: Private collection, Lugt 3005c-d (The Reliable Venetian Hand), Venice, 18th century. Sale, Christie's, London, July 6, 1977, no. 65, for £140, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1977-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Mucius Scaevola
